description: ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION INVOLVING RAISING THE PARTY WALL AND GABLE END WALL.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Particulars and samples of the materials to be used on all external faces on the building, including fenestration, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any works are commenced. Development shall be carried out in full accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Permitted Development Order 1995 (or any other Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings, other than those in the approved plan, shall be formed in the south east elevation of the extension without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the south east  flank elevation shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 5 - Informative: You are advised that this planning permission is issued on the basis that the existing ridge height is not be raised. Any increase in the existing ridge height would therefore represent a breach of planning control.
